atk-s0401a12:1_0: 170. Ekapuggalavaggassa paṭhame ekapuggaloti eko puggalo. Ettha ekoti dutiyādipaṭikkhepattho
atk-s0401a12:1_1: gaṇanaparicchedo. Puggaloti sammutikathā, na paramatthakathā. Buddhassa hi bhagavato
atk-s0401a12:1_2: duvidhā desanā – sammutidesanā, paramatthadesanā cāti. Tattha “puggalo satto itthī
atk-s0401a12:1_3: puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti evarūpā sammutidesanā, “aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ anattā
atk-s0401a12:1_4: khandhā dhātū āyatanāni satipaṭṭhānā”ti evarūpā paramatthadesanā. Tattha bhagavā
atk-s0401a12:1_5: ye sammutivasena desanaṁ sutvā atthaṁ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṁ pahāya visesaṁ adhigantuṁ
atk-s0401a12:1_6: samatthā, tesaṁ sammutidesanaṁ deseti. Ye pana paramatthavasena desanaṁ sutvā atthaṁ
atk-s0401a12:1_7: paṭivijjhitvā mohaṁ pahāya visesamadhigantuṁ samatthā, tesaṁ paramatthadesanaṁ deseti.
atk-s0401a12:2_0: Tatrāyaṁ upamā – yathā hi desabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ atthasaṁvaṇṇanako ācariyo
atk-s0401a12:2_1: ye damiḷabhāsāya vutte atthaṁ jānanti, tesaṁ damiḷabhāsāya ācikkhati. Ye andhabhāsādīsu
atk-s0401a12:2_2: aññatarāya bhāsāya, tesaṁ tāya tāya bhāsāya. Evaṁ te māṇavakā chekaṁ byattaṁ ācariyamāgamma
atk-s0401a12:2_3: khippameva sippaṁ uggaṇhanti. Tattha ācariyo viya buddho bhagavā, tayo vedā viya
atk-s0401a12:2_4: kathetabbabhāve ṭhitāni tīṇi piṭakāni, desabhāsākosallamiva sammutiparamatthakosallaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:2_5: nānādesabhāsā māṇavakā viya sammutiparamatthavasena paṭivijjhanasamatthā veneyyasattā,
atk-s0401a12:2_6: ācariyassa damiḷabhāsādiācikkhanaṁ viya bhagavato sammutiparamatthavasena desanā
atk-s0401a12:9_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṁ katheti – hirottappadīpanatthaṁ, kammassakatādīpanatthaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:9_3: hiriyanti ottappantī”ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti, sammohamāpajjati, paṭisattu
atk-s0401a12:9_4: hoti “kimidaṁ khandhadhātuāyatanāni hiriyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti? “Itthī hiriyati
atk-s0401a12:9_5: ottappati, puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti vutte pana jānāti, na sammohamāpajjati,
atk-s0401a12:9_6: na paṭisattu hoti. Tasmā bhagavā hirottappadīpanatthaṁ puggalakathaṁ katheti.
atk-s0401a12:10: “Khandhā kammassakā, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā kammassakatādīpanatthaṁ puggalakathaṁ katheti.
atk-s0401a12:11: “Veḷuvanādayo mahāvihārā khandhehi kārāpitā, dhātūhi āyatanehī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā paccattapurisakāradīpanatthaṁ puggalakathaṁ katheti.
atk-s0401a12:12_0: “Khandhā mātaraṁ jīvitā voropenti, pitaraṁ, arahantaṁ, ruhiruppādakammaṁ, saṅghabhedakammaṁ
atk-s0401a12:12_1: karonti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā ānantariyadīpanatthaṁ
atk-s0401a12:13: “Khandhā mettāyanti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā brahmavihāradīpanatthaṁ puggalakathaṁ katheti.
atk-s0401a12:14: “Khandhā pubbenivāsamanussaranti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā pubbenivāsadīpanatthaṁ puggalakathaṁ katheti.
atk-s0401a12:15_0: “Khandhā dānaṁ paṭiggaṇhanti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi mahājano na jānāti, sammohaṁ
atk-s0401a12:15_1: āpajjati, paṭisattu hoti “kimidaṁ khandhadhātuāyatanāni paṭiggaṇhanti nāmā”ti? “Puggalā
atk-s0401a12:15_2: paṭiggaṇhanti sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammo”ti vutte pana jānāti, na sammohaṁ āpajjati,
atk-s0401a12:15_3: na paṭisattu hoti. Tasmā bhagavā dakkhiṇāvisuddhidīpanatthaṁ puggalakathaṁ katheti.
atk-s0401a12:16: Lokasammutiñca buddhā bhagavanto nappajahanti, lokasamaññāya lokaniruttiyā lokābhilāpe ṭhitāyeva dhammaṁ desenti. Tasmā bhagavā lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi puggalakathaṁ katheti.
atk-s0401a12:17_0: Iti eko ca so puggalo cāti ekapuggalo. Kenaṭṭhena ekapuggalo? Asadisaṭṭhena guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhena
atk-s0401a12:17_1: asamasamaṭṭhenāti. So hi dasannaṁ pāramīnaṁ paṭipāṭiyā āvajjanaṁ ādiṁ katvā bodhisambhāraguṇehi
atk-s0401a12:17_2: ceva buddhaguṇehi ca sesamahājanena asadisoti asadisaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo. Ye cassa
atk-s0401a12:17_3: te guṇā, te sesasattānaṁ guṇehi visiṭṭhāti guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo. Purimakā
atk-s0401a12:17_4: sammāsambuddhā sabbasattehi asamā, tehi saddhiṁ ayameva eko rūpakāyaguṇehi ceva nāmakāyaguṇehi
atk-s0401a12:18_0: Loketi tayo lokā – sattaloko, okāsaloko, saṅkhāralokoti. Tesaṁ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge
atk-s0401a12:18_1: vuttā. Tesu idha sattaloko adhippeto. Sattaloke uppajjamānopi cesa na devaloke, na
atk-s0401a12:18_2: brahmaloke, manussalokeyeva uppajjati. Manussalokepi na aññasmiṁ cakkavāḷe, imasmiṁyeva
atk-s0401a12:19_0: “Puratthimāya disāya gajaṅgalaṁ nāma nigamo, tassa parena mahāsālā, tato parā paccantimā
atk-s0401a12:19_1: janapadā, orato majjhe. Puratthimadakkhiṇāya disāya sallavatī nāma nadī, tato parā
atk-s0401a12:19_2: paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. Dakkhiṇāya disāya setakaṇṇikaṁ nāma nigamo, tato
atk-s0401a12:19_3: parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. Pacchimāya disāya thūṇaṁ nāma brāhmaṇagāmo,
atk-s0401a12:19_4: tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. Uttarāya disāya usīraddhajo nāma pabbato,
atk-s0401a12:19_5: tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe”ti evaṁ paricchinne āyāmato tiyojanasate
atk-s0401a12:19_6: vitthārato aḍḍhateyyayojanasate parikkhepato navayojanasate majjhimadese uppajjati.
atk-s0401a12:19_7: Na kevalañca tathāgatova, paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asīti mahātherā buddhamātā buddhapitā
atk-s0401a12:19_8: cakkavattī rājā aññe ca sārappattā brāhmaṇagahapatikā ettheva uppajjanti.
atk-s0401a12:20_0: Uppajjamāno uppajjatīti idaṁ pana ubhayampi vippakatavacanameva. Uppajjamāno bahujanahitāya
atk-s0401a12:20_1: uppajjati, na aññena kāraṇenāti evaṁ panettha attho veditabbo. Evarūpañcettha lakkhaṇaṁ
atk-s0401a12:20_2: na sakkā etaṁ aññena saddalakkhaṇena paṭibāhituṁ.
atk-s0401a12:21_0: Apica uppajjamāno nāma, uppajjati nāma, uppanno nāmāti ayamettha bhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0401a12:21_1: Esa hi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya laddhabyākaraṇo buddhakārake dhamme pariyesanto
atk-s0401a12:21_2: dasa pāramiyo disvā “ime dhammā mayā pūretabbā”ti katasanniṭṭhāno dānapāramiṁ pūrentopi
atk-s0401a12:21_3: uppajjamāno nāma. Sīlapāramī…pe… upekkhāpāramīti imā dasa pāramiyo pūrentopi, dasa
atk-s0401a12:21_4: upapāramiyo pūrentopi uppajjamāno nāma. Dasa paramatthapāramiyo pūrentopi uppajjamānova
atk-s0401a12:21_5: nāma. Pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Attatthacariyaṁ ñātatthacariyaṁ
atk-s0401a12:21_6: lokatthacariyaṁ pūrayamānopi uppajjamāno nāma. Kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0401a12:21_7: buddhakārake dhamme matthakaṁ pāpentopi uppajjamāno nāma. Vessantarattabhāvaṁ pahāya
atk-s0401a12:21_9: tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Devatāhi yācito pañcamahāvilokitaṁ viloketvā mahāmāyādeviyā
atk-s0401a12:21_10: kucchimhi paṭisandhiṁ gaṇhantopi, anūnādhike dasa māse gabbhavāsaṁ vasantopi uppajjamāno
atk-s0401a12:21_11: nāma. Ekūnatiṁsa vassāni agāramajjhe tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Kāmesu ādīnavaṁ
atk-s0401a12:21_12: nekkhamme ca ānisaṁsaṁ disvā rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase channasahāyo kaṇḍakaṁ vāhanavaraṁ
atk-s0401a12:21_13: āruyha nikkhamantopi uppajjamānova nāma. Tīṇi rajjāni atikkamantopi anomānadītīre
atk-s0401a12:21_14: pabbajantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṁ karontopi uppajjamāno nāma.
atk-s0401a12:21_15: Paripakkagate ñāṇe oḷārikāhāraṁ āharantopi uppajjamānova nāma. Sāyanhasamaye visākhapuṇṇamāya
atk-s0401a12:21_16: mahābodhimaṇḍaṁ āruyha mārabalaṁ vidhametvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṁ anussaritvā
atk-s0401a12:21_17: majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṁ parisodhetvā pacchimayāmasamanantare dvādasaṅgaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ
atk-s0401a12:21_18: anulomapaṭilomato sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṁ paṭivijjhantopi uppajjamānova nāma.
atk-s0401a12:21_20: anāgāmiphalakkhaṇepi uppajjamānova nāma. Arahattamaggakkhaṇe pana uppajjati nāma.
atk-s0401a12:21_21: Arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāma. Buddhānaṁ hi sāvakānaṁ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīni
atk-s0401a12:21_22: uppajjanti, saheva pana arahattamaggena sakalopi sabbaññutaññāṇādi guṇarāsi āgatova
atk-s0401a12:21_23: nāma hoti. Tasmā te nipphattasabbakiccattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppannā nāma honti.
atk-s0401a12:21_24: Imasmimpi sutte arahattaphalakkhaṇaṁyeva sandhāya “uppajjatī”ti veditabbo, uppanno
atk-s0401a12:22_0: Bahujanahitāyāti mahājanassa hitatthāya uppajjati. Bahujanasukhāyāti mahājanassa
atk-s0401a12:22_1: sukhatthāya uppajjati. Lokānukampāyāti sattalokassa anukampaṁ paṭicca uppajjati.
atk-s0401a12:22_2: Katarasattalokassāti? Yo tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṁ sutvā amatapānaṁ pivitvā dhammaṁ
atk-s0401a12:22_3: paṭivijjhi, tassa. Bhagavatā hi mahābodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṁ vītināmetvā bodhimaṇḍā
atk-s0401a12:22_4: isipatanaṁ āgamma “dveme, bhikkhave, antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā”ti dhammacakkappavattanasutte
atk-s0401a12:22_5: desite āyasmatā aññāsikoṇḍaññattherena saddhiṁ aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhā brahmāno amatapānaṁ
atk-s0401a12:22_6: piviṁsu, etassa sattalokassa anukampāya uppanno. Pañcamadivase anattalakkhaṇasuttantapariyosāne
atk-s0401a12:22_7: pañcavaggiyā therā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṁsu, etassapi sattalokassa anukampāya uppanno.
atk-s0401a12:22_8: Tato yasadārakappamukhe pañcapaṇṇāsa purise arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi, tato kappāsikavanasaṇḍe
atk-s0401a12:22_9: tiṁsa bhaddavaggiye tayo magge ca tīṇi phalāni ca sampāpesi, etassapi sattalokassa
atk-s0401a12:22_10: anukampāya uppanno. Gayāsīse ādittapariyāyasuttapariyosāne jaṭilasahassaṁ arahatte
atk-s0401a12:22_11: patiṭṭhāpesi, tālaṭṭhivane bimbisārappamukhā ekādasa nahutā brāhmaṇagahapatikā satthu
atk-s0401a12:22_12: dhammadesanaṁ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṁsu, ekaṁ nahutaṁ saraṇesu patiṭṭhitaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:22_13: Tirokuṭṭaanumodanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassehi amatapānaṁ pītaṁ. Sumanamālākārasamāgame
atk-s0401a12:22_14: caturāsītiyā ca. Dhanapālakasamāgame dasahi pāṇasahassehi, khadiraṅgārajātakasamāgame
atk-s0401a12:22_15: caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassehi, jambukaājīvakasamāgame caturāsītiyā ca. Ānandaseṭṭhisamāgame
atk-s0401a12:22_16: caturāsītiyā ca pāṇasahassehi amatapānaṁ pītaṁ. Pāsāṇakacetiye pārāyanasuttantakathādivase
atk-s0401a12:22_17: cuddasa koṭiyo amatapānaṁ piviṁsu. Yamakapāṭihāriyadivase vīsati pāṇakoṭiyo, tāvatiṁsabhavane
atk-s0401a12:22_18: paṇḍukambalasilāya nisīditvā mātaraṁ kāyasakkhiṁ katvā sattappakaraṇaṁ abhidhammaṁ
atk-s0401a12:22_19: desentassa asīti pāṇakoṭiyo, devorohane tiṁsa pāṇakoṭiyo, sakkapañhasuttante asīti
atk-s0401a12:22_20: devatāsahassāni amatapānaṁ piviṁsu. Mahāsamayasuttante maṅgalasuttante cūḷarāhulovāde
atk-s0401a12:22_21: samacittapaṭipadāyāti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu abhisamayaṁ pattasattānaṁ paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0401a12:22_22: Etassapi sattalokassa anukampāya uppannoti. Yāvajjadivasā ito paraṁ anāgate ca sāsanaṁ
atk-s0401a12:22_23: nissāya saggamokkhamagge patiṭṭhahantānaṁ vasenāpi ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0401a12:23_0: Devamanussānanti na kevalaṁ devamanussānaṁyeva, avasesānaṁ nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi atthāya
atk-s0401a12:23_1: hitāya sukhāyeva uppanno. Sahetukapaṭisandhike pana maggaphalasacchikiriyāya bhabbe
atk-s0401a12:23_2: puggale dassetuṁ etaṁ vuttaṁ. Tasmā etesampi atthāya hitāya sukhāyeva uppannoti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a12:24: Katamo ekapuggaloti ayaṁ pucchā. Pucchā ca nāmesā pañcavidhā hoti – adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā, diṭṭhasaṁsandanā pucchā, vimaticchedanā pucchā, anumatipucchā, kathetukamyatāpucchāti.
atk-s0401a12:25_0: Tāsaṁ idaṁ nānattaṁ – katamā adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā? Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṁ aññātaṁ hoti
atk-s0401a12:25_1: adiṭṭhaṁ atulitaṁ atīritaṁ avibhūtaṁ abhāvitaṁ. Tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya
atk-s0401a12:25_2: vibhūtatthāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṁ pucchati, ayaṁ adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā.
atk-s0401a12:26_0: Katamā diṭṭhasaṁsandanā pucchā? Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṁ ñātaṁ hoti diṭṭhaṁ tulitaṁ tīritaṁ
atk-s0401a12:26_1: vibhūtaṁ vibhāvitaṁ. So aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanatthāya pañhaṁ pucchati,
atk-s0401a12:27_0: Katamā vimaticchedanā pucchā? Pakatiyā saṁsayapakkhanto hoti vimatipakkhanto dveḷhakajāto
atk-s0401a12:27_1: “evaṁ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṁ nu kho, kathaṁ nu kho”ti. So vimaticchedanatthāya pañhaṁ
atk-s0401a12:28_0: Katamā anumatipucchā? Bhagavā hi bhikkhūnaṁ anumatiyā pañhaṁ pucchati – “taṁ kiṁ
atk-s0401a12:28_1: maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti? “Aniccaṁ, bhante”. “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:28_2: dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti? “Dukkhaṁ, bhante”. “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:28_3: kallaṁ nu kho taṁ samanupassituṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti? “No hetaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:29: Katamā kathetukamyatāpucchā? Bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ kathetukamyatāya pañhaṁ pucchati – “cattārome, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānā. Katame cattāro”ti? Ayaṁ kathetukamyatāpucchāti.
atk-s0401a12:30_0: Tattha buddhānaṁ purimā tisso pucchā natthi. Kasmā? Buddhānaṁ hi tīsu addhāsu kiñci
atk-s0401a12:30_1: saṅkhataṁ addhāvimuttaṁ vā asaṅkhataṁ adiṭṭhaṁ ajānitaṁ atulitaṁ atīritaṁ avibhūtaṁ
atk-s0401a12:30_2: avibhāvitaṁ nāma natthi, tasmā tesaṁ adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā natthi. Yaṁ pana bhagavatā
atk-s0401a12:30_3: attano ñāṇena paṭividdhaṁ, tassa aññena samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena
atk-s0401a12:30_4: vā brahmunā vā saddhiṁ saṁsandanakiccaṁ natthi. Tenassa diṭṭhasaṁsandanāpucchā natthi.
atk-s0401a12:30_5: Yasmā panesa akathaṁkathī tiṇṇavicikiccho sabbadhammesu vihatasaṁsayo, tenassa vimaticchedanāpucchā
atk-s0401a12:30_6: natthi. Itarā pana dve pucchā bhagavato atthi, tāsu ayaṁ kathetukamyatāpucchāti veditabbā.
atk-s0401a12:31_0: Idāni tāya pucchāya puṭṭhaṁ ekapuggalaṁ vibhāvento tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddhoti
atk-s0401a12:31_1: āha. Tattha tathāgatoti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato – tathā āgatoti tathāgato,
atk-s0401a12:31_2: tathā gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṁ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti
atk-s0401a12:31_3: tathāgato, tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato,
atk-s0401a12:32_0: Kathaṁ bhagavā tathā āgatoti tathāgato? Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā
atk-s0401a12:32_1: sammāsambuddhā āgatā, yathā vipassī bhagavā āgato, yathā sikhī bhagavā, yathā vessabhū
atk-s0401a12:32_2: bhagavā, yathā kakusandho bhagavā, yathā koṇāgamano bhagavā, yathā kassapo bhagavā
atk-s0401a12:32_3: āgatoti. Kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti? Yena abhinīhārena ete bhagavanto āgatā, teneva amhākampi
atk-s0401a12:32_4: bhagavā āgato. Atha vā yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe… yathā kassapo bhagavā dānapāramiṁ
atk-s0401a12:32_6: imā dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṁsa pāramiyo
atk-s0401a12:32_7: pūretvā, aṅgapariccāgaṁ nayanadhanarajjaputtadārapariccāganti ime pañca mahāpariccāge
atk-s0401a12:32_9: koṭiṁ patvā āgato, tathā amhākampi bhagavā āgato. Yathā ca vipassī bhagavā …pe… kassapo
atk-s0401a12:32_10: bhagavā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne cattāro sammappadhāne cattāro iddhipāde pañcindriyāni
atk-s0401a12:32_11: pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅge ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgato, tathā
atk-s0401a12:38_0: Kathaṁ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yathā sampatijāto vipassī bhagavā gato…pe… kassapo
atk-s0401a12:38_1: bhagavā gato. Kathañca so gatoti? So hi sampatijātova samehi pādehi pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a12:38_2: uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gato. Yathāha – “sampatijāto, ānanda, bodhisatto
atk-s0401a12:38_3: samehi pādehi pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati
atk-s0401a12:38_4: setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne, sabbā ca disā anuviloketi, āsabhiñca vācaṁ bhāsati
atk-s0401a12:38_5: ‘aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, ayamantimā jāti,
atk-s0401a12:38_6: natthi dāni punabbhavo”’ti. Tañcassa gamanaṁ tathaṁ ahosi avitathaṁ anekesaṁ visesādhigamānaṁ
atk-s0401a12:38_7: pubbanimittabhāvena. Yañhi so sampatijātova samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahi, idamassa caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa
atk-s0401a12:38_8: pubbanimittaṁ, uttarābhimukhabhāvo pana sabbalokuttarabhāvassa pubbanimittaṁ, sattapadavītihāro
atk-s0401a12:38_13: ayaṁ bhagavāpi gato. Tañcassa gamanaṁ kathaṁ ahosi avitathaṁ tesaṁyeva visesādhigamānaṁ
atk-s0401a12:48_0: Atha vā yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe… yathā kassapo bhagavā, ayampi bhagavā tatheva nekkhammena
atk-s0401a12:48_1: kāmacchandaṁ pahāya gato, abyāpādena byāpādaṁ, ālokasaññāya thinamiddhaṁ, avikkhepena
atk-s0401a12:48_2: uddhaccakukkuccaṁ, dhammavavatthānena vicikicchaṁ pahāya gato, ñāṇena avijjaṁ padāletvā
atk-s0401a12:48_3: gato, pāmojjena aratiṁ vinodetvā, paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇakavāṭaṁ ugghāṭetvā, dutiyajjhānena
atk-s0401a12:48_4: vitakkavicāraṁ vūpasametvā, tatiyajjhānena pītiṁ virājetvā, catutthajjhānena sukhadukkhaṁ
atk-s0401a12:49_0: Aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṁ pahāya, dukkhānupassanāya sukhasaññaṁ, anattānupassanāya
atk-s0401a12:49_1: attasaññaṁ, nibbidānupassanāya nandiṁ, virāgānupassanāya rāgaṁ, nirodhānupassanāya
atk-s0401a12:49_2: samudayaṁ, paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānaṁ, khayānupassanāya ghanasaññaṁ, vayānupassanāya
atk-s0401a12:49_3: āyūhanaṁ, vipariṇāmānupassanāya dhuvasaññaṁ, animittānupassanāya nimittasaññaṁ, appaṇihitānupassanāya
atk-s0401a12:49_7: kilese bhañjitvā, sakadāgāmimaggena oḷārike kilese pahāya, anāgāmimaggena aṇusahagate
atk-s0401a12:49_8: kilese samugghātetvā, arahattamaggena sabbakilese samucchinditvā gato. Evampi tathā gatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0401a12:50_0: Kathaṁ tathalakkhaṇaṁ āgatoti tathāgato? Pathavīdhātuyā kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇaṁ tathaṁ
atk-s0401a12:50_1: avitathaṁ, āpodhātuyā paggharaṇalakkhaṇaṁ, tejodhātuyā uṇhattalakkhaṇaṁ, vāyodhātuyā
atk-s0401a12:51: Rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇaṁ, vedanāya vedayitalakkhaṇaṁ, saññāya sañjānanalakkhaṇaṁ, saṅkhārānaṁ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṁ, viññāṇassa vijānanalakkhaṇaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:52: Vitakkassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇaṁ, vicārassa anumajjanalakkhaṇaṁ, pītiyā pharaṇalakkhaṇaṁ, sukhassa sātalakkhaṇaṁ, cittekaggatāya avikkhepalakkhaṇaṁ, phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:53: Saddhindriyassa adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṁ, vīriyindriyassa paggahalakkhaṇaṁ, satindriyassa upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṁ, samādhindriyassa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṁ, paññindriyassa pajānanalakkhaṇaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:54: Saddhābalassa assaddhiye akampiyalakkhaṇaṁ, vīriyabalassa kosajje, satibalassa muṭṭhassacce, samādhibalassa uddhacce, paññābalassa avijjāya akampiyalakkhaṇaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:56_2: sammāvāyāmassa paggahalakkhaṇaṁ, sammāsatiyā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṁ, sammāsamādhissa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:57_0: Avijjāya aññāṇalakkhaṇaṁ, saṅkhārānaṁ cetanālakkhaṇaṁ, viññāṇassa vijānanalakkhaṇaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:57_1: nāmassa namanalakkhaṇaṁ, rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇaṁ, saḷāyatanassa āyatanalakkhaṇaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:57_2: phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṁ, vedanāya vedayitalakkhaṇaṁ, taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇaṁ, upādānassa
atk-s0401a12:57_3: gahaṇalakkhaṇaṁ, bhavassa āyūhanalakkhaṇaṁ, jātiyā nibbattilakkhaṇaṁ, jarāya jīraṇalakkhaṇaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:58_0: Dhātūnaṁ suññatālakkhaṇaṁ, āyatanānaṁ āyatanalakkhaṇaṁ, satipaṭṭhānānaṁ upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:58_1: sammappadhānānaṁ padahanalakkhaṇaṁ, iddhipādānaṁ ijjhanalakkhaṇaṁ, indriyānaṁ adhipatilakkhaṇaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:58_2: balānaṁ akampiyalakkhaṇaṁ, bojjhaṅgānaṁ niyyānalakkhaṇaṁ, maggassa hetulakkhaṇaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:59: Saccānaṁ tathalakkhaṇaṁ, samathassa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṁ, vipassanāya anupassanālakkhaṇaṁ, samathavipassanānaṁ ekarasalakkhaṇaṁ, yuganaddhānaṁ anativattanalakkhaṇaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:60: Sīlavisuddhiyā saṁvaraṇalakkhaṇaṁ, cittavisuddhiyā avikkhepalakkhaṇaṁ, diṭṭhivisuddhiyā dassanalakkhaṇaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:61: Khaye ñāṇassa samucchedalakkhaṇaṁ, anuppāde ñāṇassa passaddhilakkhaṇaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:62_0: Chandassa mūlalakkhaṇaṁ, manasikārassa samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṁ, phassassa samodhānalakkhaṇaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:62_1: vedanāya samosaraṇalakkhaṇaṁ, samādhissa pamukhalakkhaṇaṁ, satiyā ādhipateyyalakkhaṇaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:62_2: paññāya tatuttariyalakkhaṇaṁ, vimuttiyā sāralakkhaṇaṁ, amatogadhassa nibbānassa pariyosānalakkhaṇaṁ
atk-s0401a12:62_3: tathaṁ avitathaṁ. Evaṁ tathalakkhaṇaṁ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto anuppattoti
atk-s0401a12:63_0: Kathaṁ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato? Tathadhammā nāma cattāri
atk-s0401a12:63_1: ariyasaccāni. Yathāha – “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0401a12:63_2: Katamāni cattāri? ‘Idaṁ dukkha’nti, bhikkhave, tathametaṁ avitathametaṁ anaññathameta”nti
atk-s0401a12:63_3: vitthāro. Tāni ca bhagavā abhisambuddho, tasmā tathānaṁ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti
atk-s0401a12:64_0: Apica jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…
atk-s0401a12:64_1: saṅkhārānaṁ avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho. Tathā avijjāya
atk-s0401a12:64_2: saṅkhārānaṁ paccayaṭṭho, saṅkhārānaṁ viññāṇassa paccayaṭṭho…pe… jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa
atk-s0401a12:64_3: paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho. Taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavā abhisambuddho. Tasmāpi tathānaṁ
atk-s0401a12:64_4: dhammānaṁ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati. Evaṁ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato.
atk-s0401a12:65_0: Kathaṁ tathadassitāya tathāgato? Bhagavā yaṁ sadevake loke…pe… sadevamanussāya aparimāṇāsu
atk-s0401a12:65_1: lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṁ āgacchantaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ nāma
atk-s0401a12:65_2: atthi, taṁ sabbākārato jānāti passati. Evaṁ jānatā passatā ca tena taṁ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena
atk-s0401a12:65_3: vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā “katamaṁ taṁ rūpaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ?
atk-s0401a12:65_4: Yaṁ rūpaṁ catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṁ sappaṭighaṁ nīlaṁ
atk-s0401a12:65_5: pītaka”ntiādinā nayena anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṁ
atk-s0401a12:65_6: tathameva hoti, vitathaṁ natthi. Esa nayo sotadvārādīsupi āpāthamāgacchantesu saddādīsu.
atk-s0401a12:65_7: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā – “yaṁ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sadevamanussāya
atk-s0401a12:65_8: diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā, tamahaṁ jānāmi,
atk-s0401a12:65_9: tamahaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, taṁ tathāgatassa viditaṁ, taṁ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī”ti. Evaṁ
atk-s0401a12:65_10: tathadassitāya tathāgato. Tattha tathadassīatthe tathāgatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0401a12:66_0: Kathaṁ tathavāditāya tathāgato? Yaṁ rattiṁ bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno
atk-s0401a12:66_1: tiṇṇaṁ mārānaṁ matthakaṁ madditvā anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho, yañca rattiṁ
atk-s0401a12:66_2: yamakasālānaṁ antare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi, etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe
atk-s0401a12:66_3: kāle paṭhamabodhiyāpi majjhimabodhiyāpi pacchimabodhiyāpi yaṁ bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ
atk-s0401a12:66_4: suttaṁ geyyaṁ…pe… vedallaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ atthato ca byañjanato ca anupavajjaṁ anūnaṁ
atk-s0401a12:66_5: anadhikaṁ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṁ rāgamadanimmadanaṁ dosamohamadanimmadanaṁ, natthi tattha
atk-s0401a12:66_6: vālaggamattampi avakkhalitaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ ekamuddikāya lañchitaṁ viya ekanāḷikāya
atk-s0401a12:66_7: mitaṁ viya ekatulāya tulitaṁ viya ca tathameva hoti avitathaṁ. Tenāha – “yañca, cunda,
atk-s0401a12:66_8: rattiṁ tathāgato anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṁ anupādisesāya
atk-s0401a12:66_9: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati, yaṁ etasmiṁ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati, sabbaṁ
atk-s0401a12:66_10: taṁ tatheva hoti no aññathā. Tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī”ti. Gadattho hi ettha gatasaddo.
atk-s0401a12:67: Apica āgadanaṁ āgado, vacananti attho. Tatho aviparīto āgado assāti dakārassa takāraṁ katvā tathāgatoti evampetasmiṁ atthe padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0401a12:68_0: Kathaṁ tathākāritāya tathāgato? Bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi kāyassapi vācā,
atk-s0401a12:68_1: tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti. Evaṁ bhūtassa cassa yathā
atk-s0401a12:68_2: vācā, kāyopi tathā gato, pavattoti attho. Yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā gatāti tathāgato.
atk-s0401a12:68_3: Tenevāha – “yathāvādī, bhikkhave, tathāgato tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī. Iti yathāvādī
atk-s0401a12:68_4: tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī. Tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti. Evaṁ tathākāritāya tathāgato.
atk-s0401a12:69_0: Kathaṁ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato? Upari bhavaggaṁ heṭṭhā avīciṁ pariyantaṁ katvā
atk-s0401a12:69_1: tiriyaṁ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi
atk-s0401a12:69_2: vimuttiyāpi, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṁ vā atthi, atulo appameyyo anuttaro rājarājo
atk-s0401a12:69_3: devadevo sakkānamatisakko brahmānamatibrahmā. Tenāha – “sadevake loke, bhikkhave…pe…
atk-s0401a12:69_4: sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthu daso vasavattī. Tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0401a12:70_0: Tatrevaṁ padasiddhi veditabbā – agado viya agado. Ko panesa? Desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo
atk-s0401a12:70_1: ca. Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca
atk-s0401a12:70_2: lokaṁ abhibhavati. Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo
atk-s0401a12:70_3: ca agado assāti dakārassa takāraṁ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo. Evaṁ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato.
atk-s0401a12:71_0: Apica tathāya gatotipi tathāgato, tathaṁ gatotipi tathāgato, gatoti avagato atīto
atk-s0401a12:71_1: patto paṭipannoti attho. Tattha sakalalokaṁ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti
atk-s0401a12:71_2: tathāgato. Lokasamudayaṁ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato, lokanirodhaṁ
atk-s0401a12:71_3: sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato, lokanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ tathāya
atk-s0401a12:71_4: gato paṭipannoti tathāgato. Tena yaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā –
atk-s0401a12:72_0: “Loko, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasmā tathāgato visaṁyutto. Lokasamudayo,
atk-s0401a12:72_1: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasamudayo tathāgatassa pahīno. Lokanirodho,
atk-s0401a12:72_2: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokanirodho tathāgatassa sacchikato. Lokanirodhagāminī
atk-s0401a12:72_3: paṭipadā, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadā tathāgatassa
atk-s0401a12:72_4: bhāvitā. Yaṁ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sabbaṁ taṁ tathāgatena abhisambuddhaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:73: Tassapi evaṁ attho veditabbo. Idampi ca tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvadīpane mukhamattameva. Sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṁ vaṇṇeyya.
atk-s0401a12:74_0: Arahaṁ sammāsambuddhoti padadvaye pana ārakattā, arīnaṁ arānañca hatattā, paccayādīnaṁ
atk-s0401a12:74_1: arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi arahanti veditabbo. Sammā sāmañca
atk-s0401a12:74_2: sabbadhammānaṁ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddhoti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panetaṁ
atk-s0401a12:75_0: 171. Dutiye pātubhāvoti uppatti nipphatti. Dullabho lokasminti imasmiṁ sattaloke
atk-s0401a12:75_1: dullabho sudullabho paramadullabho. Kasmā dullabhoti? Ekavāraṁ dānapāramiṁ pūretvā
atk-s0401a12:75_2: buddhena bhavituṁ na sakkā, dve vāre dasa vāre vīsati vāre paññāsa vāre vārasataṁ
atk-s0401a12:75_3: vārasahassaṁ vārasatasahassaṁ vārakoṭisatasahassampi dānapāramiṁ pūretvā buddhena
atk-s0401a12:75_4: bhavituṁ na sakkā, tathā ekadivasaṁ dve divase dasa divase vīsati divase paññāsa
atk-s0401a12:75_5: divase divasasataṁ divasasahassaṁ divasasatasahassaṁ divasakoṭisatasahassaṁ. Ekamāsaṁ
atk-s0401a12:75_6: dve māse…pe… māsakoṭisatasahassaṁ. Ekasaṁvaccharaṁ dve saṁvacchare…pe… saṁvaccharakoṭisatasahassaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:75_7: Ekakappaṁ dve kappe…pe… kappakoṭisatasahassaṁ. Kappānaṁ ekaṁ asaṅkhyeyyaṁ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0401a12:75_8: tīṇi asaṅkhyeyyāni dānapāramiṁ pūretvā buddhena bhavituṁ na sakkā. Sīlapāramīnekkhammapāramī…pe…
atk-s0401a12:75_9: upekkhāpāramīsupi eseva nayo. Pacchimakoṭiyā pana kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri
atk-s0401a12:75_10: asaṅkhyeyyāni dasa pāramiyo pūretvā buddhena bhavituṁ sakkāti iminā kāraṇena dullabho.
atk-s0401a12:76_0: 172. Tatiye acchariyamanussoti acchariyo manusso. Acchariyoti andhassa pabbatārohaṇaṁ
atk-s0401a12:76_1: viya niccaṁ na hotīti attho. Ayaṁ tāva saddanayo. Ayaṁ pana aṭṭhakathānayo – accharāyoggoti
atk-s0401a12:76_2: acchariyo, accharaṁ paharitvā passitabboti attho. Apica “tathāgatassa, bhikkhave,
atk-s0401a12:76_3: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā pātubhavantī”ti
atk-s0401a12:76_4: evamādīhi anekehi acchariyabbhutadhammehi samannāgatattāpi acchariyamanusso. Āciṇṇamanussotipi acchariyamanusso.
atk-s0401a12:77_0: Abhinīhārassa hi sampādake aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā ekabuddhassa sammukhe mahābodhimaṇḍe
atk-s0401a12:77_1: mānasaṁ bandhitvā nisajjanaṁ nāma na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṁ, sabbaññubodhisattasseva
atk-s0401a12:77_2: āciṇṇaṁ. Tathā buddhānaṁ santike byākaraṇaṁ labhitvā anivattakena hutvā vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0401a12:77_3: adhiṭṭhāya buddhakārakadhammānaṁ pūraṇampi na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṁ, sabbaññubodhisattasseva
atk-s0401a12:77_4: āciṇṇaṁ. Tathā pāramiyo gabbhaṁ gaṇhāpetvā vessantarattabhāvasadise attabhāve ṭhatvā
atk-s0401a12:77_5: sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitānaṁ hatthīnaṁ sattasatāni assānaṁ sattasatānīti evaṁ sattasatakamahādānaṁ
atk-s0401a12:77_6: datvā jālikumārasadisaṁ puttaṁ, kaṇhājināsadisaṁ dhītaraṁ, maddīdevisadisaṁ bhariyañca
atk-s0401a12:77_7: dānamukhe niyyātetvā yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā dutiye attabhāve tusitabhavane paṭisandhiggahaṇampi
atk-s0401a12:77_8: na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṁ, sabbaññubodhisattasseva āciṇṇaṁ. Tusitapure yāvatāyukaṁ
atk-s0401a12:77_9: ṭhatvā devatānaṁ āyācanaṁ sampaṭicchitvā pañcamahāvilokanaṁ viloketvā satassa sampajānassa
atk-s0401a12:77_10: tusitapurā cavitvā mahābhogakule paṭisandhiggahaṇampi na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:77_12: satassa sampajānassa mātukucchiyaṁ nivāsopi, satassa sampajānassa mātukucchito nikkhamanadivase
atk-s0401a12:77_14: dhāraṇampi, dibbavāḷabījanukkhepopi, sabbadisāsu sīhavilokanaṁ viloketvā attanā paṭisamaṁ
atk-s0401a12:77_15: kañci sattaṁ adisvā “aggohamasmi lokassā”ti evaṁ sīhanādanadanampi, paripākagate
atk-s0401a12:77_16: ñāṇe mahāsampattiṁ pahāya mahābhinikkhamanampi, mahābodhimaṇḍe pallaṅkena nisinnassa
atk-s0401a12:77_17: māravijayaṁ ādiṁ katvā pubbenivāsānussatidibbacakkhuvisodhanāni katvā paccūsasamaye
atk-s0401a12:77_19: anuttaraṁ tiparivaṭṭaṁ dhammacakkappavattanampīti evamādi sabbaṁ na aññassa kassaci
atk-s0401a12:77_20: āciṇṇaṁ, sabbaññubuddhasseva āciṇṇaṁ. Evaṁ āciṇṇamanussotipi acchariyamanusso.
atk-s0401a12:78_0: 173. Catutthe kālakiriyāti ekasmiṁ kāle pākaṭā kiriyāti kālakiriyā. Tathāgato hi
atk-s0401a12:78_1: pañcacattālīsa vassāni ṭhatvā tīṇi piṭakāni pañca nikāye navaṅgaṁ satthusāsanaṁ caturāsīti
atk-s0401a12:78_2: dhammakkhandhasahassāni pakāsetvā mahājanaṁ nibbānaninnaṁ nibbānapoṇaṁ katvā yamakasālānamantare
atk-s0401a12:78_3: nipanno bhikkhusaṅghaṁ āmantetvā appamādena ovaditvā sato sampajāno anupādisesāya
atk-s0401a12:78_4: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Ayamassa kiriyā yāvajjatanā pākaṭāti ekasmiṁ kāle pākaṭā
atk-s0401a12:78_5: kiriyāti kālakiriyā. Anutappā hotīti anutāpakarā hoti. Tattha cakkavattirañño kālakiriyā
atk-s0401a12:78_6: ekacakkavāḷe devamanussānaṁ anutāpakarā hoti. Buddhānaṁ kālakiriyā dasasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0401a12:78_7: devamanussānaṁ anutāpakarā hoti. Tena vuttaṁ – “bahuno janassa anutappā hotī”ti.
atk-s0401a12:79_0: 174. Pañcame adutiyoti dutiyassa buddhassa abhāvā adutiyo. Cattāro hi buddhā sutabuddho,
atk-s0401a12:79_1: catusaccabuddho, paccekabuddho, sabbaññubuddhoti. Tattha bahussuto bhikkhu sutabuddho
atk-s0401a12:79_2: nāma. Khīṇāsavo catusaccabuddho nāma. Kappasatasahassādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo
atk-s0401a12:79_3: pūretvā sāmaṁ paṭividdhapaccekabodhiñāṇo paccekabuddho nāma. Kappasatasahassādhikāni
atk-s0401a12:79_4: cattāri vā aṭṭha vā soḷasa vā asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā tiṇṇaṁ mārānaṁ matthakaṁ
atk-s0401a12:79_5: madditvā paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo sabbaññubuddho nāma. Imesu catūsu buddhesu sabbaññubuddhova
atk-s0401a12:79_6: adutiyo nāma. Na hi tena saddhiṁ añño sabbaññubuddho nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0401a12:80_0: Asahāyoti attabhāvena vā paṭividdhadhammehi vā sadiso sahāyo nāma assa natthīti asahāyo.
atk-s0401a12:80_1: “Laddhasahāyo kho pana so bhagavā sekhānañceva paṭipadāna”nti iminā pana pariyāyena
atk-s0401a12:80_2: sekhāsekhā buddhānaṁ sahāyā nāma honti. Appaṭimoti paṭimā vuccati attabhāvo, tassa
atk-s0401a12:80_3: attabhāvasadisā aññā paṭimā natthīti appaṭimo. Yāpi ca manussā suvaṇṇarajatādimayā
atk-s0401a12:80_4: paṭimā karonti, tāsu vālaggamattampi okāsaṁ tathāgatassa attabhāvasadisaṁ kātuṁ samattho
atk-s0401a12:81_0: Appaṭisamoti attabhāvenevassa paṭisamo nāma koci natthīti appaṭisamo. Appaṭibhāgoti
atk-s0401a12:81_1: ye tathāgatena “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena dhammā desitā, tesu “na cattāro
atk-s0401a12:81_2: satipaṭṭhānā, tayo vā pañca vā”tiādinā nayena paṭibhāgaṁ kātuṁ samattho nāma natthīti
atk-s0401a12:81_3: appaṭibhāgo. Appaṭipuggaloti añño koci “ahaṁ buddho”ti evaṁ paṭiññaṁ kātuṁ samattho
atk-s0401a12:81_4: puggalo natthīti appaṭipuggalo. Asamoti appaṭipuggalattāva sabbasattehi asamo. Asamasamoti
atk-s0401a12:81_5: asamā vuccanti atītānāgatā sabbaññubuddhā, tehi asamehi samoti asamasamo.
atk-s0401a12:82_0: Dvipadānaṁ aggoti sammāsambuddho apadānaṁ dvipadānaṁ catuppadānaṁ bahuppadānaṁ rūpīnaṁ
atk-s0401a12:82_1: arūpīnaṁ saññīnaṁ asaññīnaṁ nevasaññīnāsaññīnaṁ sattānaṁ aggova. Kasmā idha dvipadānaṁ
atk-s0401a12:82_2: aggoti vutto? Seṭṭhataravasena. Imasmiñhi loke seṭṭho nāma uppajjamāno apadacatuppadabahuppadesu
atk-s0401a12:82_3: na uppajjati, dvipadesuyeva uppajjati. Kataradvipadvesūti? Manussesu ceva devesu
atk-s0401a12:82_4: ca. Manussesu uppajjamāno tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṁ vase vattetuṁ samattho buddho
atk-s0401a12:82_5: hutvā uppajjati. Devesu uppajjamāno dasasahassilokadhātuṁ vasavattī mahābrahmā hutvā
atk-s0401a12:82_6: uppajjati. So tassa kappiyakārako vā ārāmiko vā sampajjati. Iti tatopi seṭṭhataravasenesa
atk-s0401a12:83_0: 175-186. Chaṭṭhādīsu ekapuggalassa, bhikkhave, pātubhāvā mahato cakkhussa pātubhāvo
atk-s0401a12:83_1: hotīti, bhikkhave, ekapuggalassa tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvena
atk-s0401a12:83_2: mahantassa cakkhussa pātubhāvo hoti. Tasmiṁ puggale pātubhūte taṁ pātubhūtameva hoti,
atk-s0401a12:83_3: na vinā tassa pātubhāvena pātubhavati. Pātubhāvoti uppatti nipphatti. Katamassa cakkhussāti?
atk-s0401a12:83_5: samādhipaññāsadisassāti. Ālokādīsupi eseva nayo. Ubhinnaṁ aggasāvakānaṁ paññāālokasadisoyeva
atk-s0401a12:83_6: hi ettha āloko, paññāobhāsasadisoyeva obhāso adhippeto. “Mahato cakkhussa, mahato
atk-s0401a12:83_7: ālokassa, mahato obhāsassā”ti imāni ca pana tīṇipi lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0401a12:84_0: Channaṁ anuttariyānanti uttaritaravirahitānaṁ channaṁ uttamadhammānaṁ. Tattha dassanānuttariyaṁ,
atk-s0401a12:84_2: imāni cha anuttariyāni. Imesaṁ pātubhāvo hotīti attho. Āyasmā hi ānandatthero sāyaṁpātaṁ
atk-s0401a12:84_3: tathāgataṁ cakkhuviññāṇena daṭṭhuṁ labhati, idaṁ dassanānuttariyaṁ. Aññopi sotāpanno
atk-s0401a12:84_4: vā sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā ānandatthero viya tathāgataṁ dassanāya labhati, idampi
atk-s0401a12:84_5: dassanānuttariyaṁ. Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalaṁ dassanāya
atk-s0401a12:84_6: labhitvā taṁ dassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṁ pāpeti. Idaṁ dassanameva nāma, mūladassanaṁ
atk-s0401a12:85_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca abhikkhaṇaṁ dasabalassa vacanaṁ sotaviññāṇena sotuṁ labhati,
atk-s0401a12:85_1: idaṁ savanānuttariyaṁ. Aññepi sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya tathāgatassa vacanaṁ
atk-s0401a12:85_2: savanāya labhanti, idampi savanānuttariyaṁ. Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero
atk-s0401a12:85_3: viya tathāgatassa vacanaṁ sotuṁ labhitvā taṁ savanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṁ pāpeti.
atk-s0401a12:85_4: Idaṁ savanameva nāma, mūlasavanaṁ pana savanānuttariyaṁ nāma.
atk-s0401a12:86_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca dasabale saddhaṁ paṭilabhati, idaṁ lābhānuttariyaṁ. Aññepi sotāpannādayo
atk-s0401a12:86_1: ānandatthero viya dasabale saddhāpaṭilābhaṁ labhanti, idampi lābhānuttariyaṁ. Aparo
atk-s0401a12:86_2: pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabale saddhāpaṭilābhaṁ labhitvā taṁ
atk-s0401a12:86_3: lābhaṁ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṁ pāpeti, ayaṁ lābhoyeva nāma, mūlalābho pana lābhānuttariyaṁ nāma.
atk-s0401a12:87_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca dasabalassa sāsane tisso sikkhā sikkhati, idaṁ sikkhānuttariyaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:87_1: Aññepi sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya dasabalassa sāsane tisso sikkhā sikkhanti,
atk-s0401a12:87_2: idampi sikkhānuttariyaṁ. Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalassa
atk-s0401a12:87_3: sāsane tisso sikkhā sikkhitvā tā sikkhā vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṁ pāpeti. Ayaṁ sikkhāyeva
atk-s0401a12:88_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca abhiṇhaṁ dasabalaṁ paricarati, idaṁ pāricariyānuttariyaṁ. Aññepi
atk-s0401a12:88_1: sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya abhiṇhaṁ dasabalaṁ paricaranti, idampi pāricariyānuttariyaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:88_2: Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalaṁ paricaritvā taṁ pāricariyaṁ
atk-s0401a12:88_3: vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṁ pāpeti, ayaṁ pāricariyāyeva nāma, mūlapāricariyā pana pāricariyānuttariyaṁ nāma.
atk-s0401a12:89_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca dasabalassa lokiyalokuttare guṇe anussarati, idaṁ anussatānuttariyaṁ.
atk-s0401a12:89_1: Aññepi sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya dasabalassa lokiyalokuttare guṇe anussaranti,
atk-s0401a12:89_2: idampi anussatānuttariyaṁ. Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalassa
atk-s0401a12:89_3: lokiyalokuttare guṇe anussaritvā taṁ anussatiṁ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṁ pāpeti,
atk-s0401a12:89_4: ayaṁ anussatiyeva nāma, mūlānussati pana anussatānuttariyaṁ nāma. Imāni cha anuttariyāni,
atk-s0401a12:89_5: imesaṁ pātubhāvo hoti. Imāni ca pana cha anuttariyāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0401a12:90_0: Catunnaṁpaṭisambhidānaṁ sacchikiriyā hotīti catasso hi paṭisambhidāyo atthapaṭisambhidā,
atk-s0401a12:90_2: ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā, dhammesu ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā, atthadhammaniruttābhilāpe
atk-s0401a12:90_3: ñāṇaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0401a12:90_4: vitthāro panetāsaṁ abhidhamme āgatoyeva. Imāsaṁ catassannaṁ paṭisambhidānaṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0401a12:90_5: paccakkhakiriyā hoti, na vinā buddhuppādā. Etāsaṁ sacchikiriyāti attho. Imāpi lokiyalokuttarāva
atk-s0401a12:91_1: paṭivedho hoti, na vinā buddhuppādenāti attho. Nānādhātupaṭivedhoti ettha imāva aṭṭhārasa
atk-s0401a12:91_2: dhātuyo nānāsabhāvato nānādhātuyoti veditabbā. Yo panetāsaṁ “nānāsabhāvā etā”ti evaṁ
atk-s0401a12:91_3: nānākaraṇato paṭivedho, ayaṁ nānādhātupaṭivedho nāma. Vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyāti
atk-s0401a12:91_4: ettha vijjāti phale ñāṇaṁ, vimuttīti tadavasesā phalasampayuttā dhammā. Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāti
atk-s0401a12:91_5: sototi paṭhamamaggo, tena sotena pattabbaṁ phalanti sotāpattiphalaṁ. Sakadāgāmiphalādīni pākaṭāneva.
atk-s0401a12:96_0: Ettha uracakke āgato. “Cakkasamāruḷhā jānapadā pariyāyantī”ti ettha iriyāpathacakke.
atk-s0401a12:96_1: “Atha kho so, bhikkhave, rathakāro yaṁ taṁ cakkaṁ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṁ, taṁ pavattesī”ti
atk-s0401a12:96_2: ettha dārucakke. “Addasā kho doṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavato pādesu cakkāni sahassārānī”ti
atk-s0401a12:96_3: ettha lakkhaṇacakke. “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṁ devamanussānaṁ
atk-s0401a12:96_4: catucakkaṁ vattatī”ti ettha sampatticakke. “Dibbaṁ cakkaratanaṁ pātubhavatī”ti ettha
atk-s0401a12:97_0: Pavattitanti ettha dhammacakkaṁ abhinīharati nāma, abhinīhaṭaṁ nāma, uppādeti nāma,
atk-s0401a12:97_1: uppāditaṁ nāma, pavatteti nāma, pavattitaṁ nāmāti ayaṁ pabhedo veditabbo. Kuto paṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a12:97_2: dhammacakkaṁ abhinīharati nāmāti? Yadā sumedhabrāhmaṇo hutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṁ nekkhamme
atk-s0401a12:97_3: ca ānisaṁsaṁ disvā sattasatakamahādānaṁ datvā isipabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā pañca abhiññā
atk-s0401a12:97_4: aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbatteti, tato paṭṭhāya dhammacakkaṁ abhinīharati nāma.
atk-s0401a12:98_0: Kuto paṭṭhāya abhinīhaṭaṁ nāmāti? Yadā aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā dīpaṅkarapādamūle
atk-s0401a12:98_1: mahābodhimaṇḍatthāya mānasaṁ bandhitvā “byākaraṇaṁ aladdhā na vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0401a12:98_2: adhiṭṭhāya nipanno dasabalassa santikā byākaraṇaṁ labhi, tato paṭṭhāya dhammacakkaṁ abhinīhaṭaṁ nāma.
atk-s0401a12:99_0: Kuto paṭṭhāya uppādeti nāmāti? Tato paṭṭhāya dānapāramiṁ pūrentopi dhammacakkaṁ uppādeti
atk-s0401a12:99_1: nāma. Sīlapāramiṁ pūrentopi…pe… upekkhāpāramiṁ pūrentopi dhammacakkaṁ uppādeti nāma.
atk-s0401a12:99_2: Dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyo pūrentopi, pañca mahāpariccāge
atk-s0401a12:99_3: pariccajantopi, ñātatthacariyaṁ pūrentopi dhammacakkaṁ uppādeti nāma. Vessantarattabhāve
atk-s0401a12:99_4: ṭhatvā sattasatakamahādānaṁ datvā puttadāraṁ dānamukhe niyyātetvā pāramikūṭaṁ gahetvā
atk-s0401a12:99_5: tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā devatāhi āyācito paṭiññaṁ datvā
atk-s0401a12:99_6: pañcamahāvilokanaṁ vilokentopi dhammacakkaṁ uppādetiyeva nāma. Mātukucchiyaṁ paṭisandhiṁ
atk-s0401a12:99_7: gaṇhantopi, paṭisandhikkhaṇe dasasahassacakkavāḷaṁ kampentopi, mātukucchito nikkhantadivase
atk-s0401a12:99_8: tatheva lokaṁ kampentopi, sampatijāto satta padāni gantvā “aggomahasmī”ti sīhanādaṁ
atk-s0401a12:99_9: nadantopi, ekūnatiṁsa saṁvaccharāni agāramajjhe vasantopi, mahābhinikkhamanaṁ nikkhamantopi,
atk-s0401a12:99_10: anomānadītīre pabbajantopi, mahāpadhāne chabbassāni vīriyaṁ karontopi, sujātāya dinnaṁ
atk-s0401a12:99_11: madhupāyāsaṁ bhuñjitvā suvaṇṇapātiṁ nadiyā pavāhetvā sāyanhasamaye bodhimaṇḍavaragato
atk-s0401a12:99_12: puratthimaṁ lokadhātuṁ olokento nisīditvā sūriye dharamāneyeva mārabalaṁ vidhametvā
atk-s0401a12:99_13: paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṁ anussarantopi, majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṁ visodhentopi, paccūsakālasamanantare
atk-s0401a12:99_14: paccayākāraṁ sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṁ paṭivijjhantopi, sotāpattiphalaṁ sacchikarontopi,
atk-s0401a12:99_15: sakadāgāmimaggaṁ sakadāgāmiphalaṁ anāgāmimaggaṁ anāgāmiphalaṁ sacchikarontopi, arahattamaggaṁ
atk-s0401a12:100_0: Arahattaphalakkhaṇe pana tena dhammacakkaṁ uppāditaṁ nāma. Buddhānañhi sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇarāsi
atk-s0401a12:100_1: arahattaphaleneva saddhiṁ ijjhati. Tasmā tena tasmiṁ khaṇe dhammacakkaṁ uppāditaṁ nāma hoti.
atk-s0401a12:101_0: Kadā pavatteti nāma? Bodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṁ vītināmetvā isipatane migadāye aññākoṇḍaññattheraṁ
atk-s0401a12:101_1: kāyasakkhiṁ katvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṁ desento dhammacakkaṁ pavatteti nāma.
atk-s0401a12:102_0: Yadā pana aññākoṇḍaññattherena dasabalassa desanāñāṇānubhāvanibbattaṁ savanaṁ labhitvā
atk-s0401a12:102_1: sabbapaṭhamaṁ dhammo adhigato, tato paṭṭhāya dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ nāma hotīti
atk-s0401a12:102_2: veditabbaṁ. Dhammacakkanti cetaṁ desanāñāṇassapi nāmaṁ paṭivedhañāṇassapi. Tesu desanāñāṇaṁ
atk-s0401a12:102_3: lokiyaṁ, paṭivedhañāṇaṁ lokuttaraṁ. Kassa desanāpaṭivedhañāṇanti? Na aññassa kassaci,
atk-s0401a12:103_0: Sammadevāti hetunā nayena kāraṇeneva. Anuppavattetīti yathā purato gacchantassa pacchato
atk-s0401a12:103_1: gacchanto taṁ anugacchati nāma, evaṁ paṭhamataraṁ satthārā pavattitaṁ thero anuppavatteti
atk-s0401a12:103_2: nāma. Kathaṁ? Satthā hi “cattārome, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānā. Katame cattāro”ti kathento
atk-s0401a12:103_3: dhammacakkaṁ pavatteti nāma, dhammasenāpati sāriputtattheropi “cattārome, āvuso,
atk-s0401a12:103_4: satipaṭṭhānā”ti kathento dhammacakkaṁ anuppavatteti nāma. Sammappadhānādīsupi eseva
atk-s0401a12:103_5: nayo. Na kevalañca bodhipakkhiyadhammesu, “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni.
atk-s0401a12:103_6: Cattārome, bhikkhave, ariyavaṁsā”tiādīsupi ayaṁ nayo netabbova. Evaṁ sammāsambuddho
atk-s0401a12:103_7: dhammacakkaṁ pavatteti nāma, thero dasabalena pavattitaṁ dhammacakkaṁ anuppavatteti nāma.
atk-s0401a12:104_0: Evaṁ dhammacakkaṁ anuppavattentena pana therena dhammo desitopi pakāsitopi satthārāva
atk-s0401a12:104_1: desito pakāsito hoti. Yo hi koci bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā devo
atk-s0401a12:104_2: vā sakko vā māro vā brahmā vā dhammaṁ desetu pakāsetu, sabbo so satthārā desito pakāsitova
atk-s0401a12:104_3: nāma hoti, sesajano pana lekhahārakapakkhe ṭhitova nāma hoti. Kathaṁ? Yathā hi raññā
atk-s0401a12:104_4: dinnaṁ paṇṇaṁ vācetvā yaṁ yaṁ kammaṁ karonti, taṁ taṁ kammaṁ yena kenaci katampi
atk-s0401a12:104_5: kāritampi raññā kāritanteva vuccati. Mahārājā viya hi sammāsambuddho. Rājapaṇṇaṁ
atk-s0401a12:104_6: viya tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ. Paṇṇadānaṁ viya tepiṭake nayamukhadānaṁ paṇṇaṁ vācetvā
atk-s0401a12:104_7: taṁtaṁkammānaṁ karaṇaṁ viya catunnaṁ parisānaṁ attano balena buddhavacanaṁ uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0401a12:104_8: paresaṁ desanā pakāsanā. Tattha yathā paṇṇaṁ vācetvā yena kenaci katampi kāritampi
atk-s0401a12:104_9: taṁ kammaṁ raññā kāritameva hoti, evameva yena kenaci desitopi pakāsitopi dhammo
atk-s0401a12:104_10: satthārā desito pakāsitova nāma hotīti veditabbo. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
